head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MOSS, LEE MACHLES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MOSS, LEE MACHLES

block.p: MOSS-Lee Machles. Widow of Judge Allen Moss. Mother of Susan M. Daum, MD and Ellen M. Poler, JD. On October 13, at age 90. Memorial service, Sunday, November 19, at 3 PM at the 92nd St. YMHA Art Gallery, 92nd St. and Lexington Ave. In lieu of flowers, donations may be sent to the 92nd St. YMHA 60+ Program.

MOSS-Lee Machles. Widow of Judge Allen Moss. Mother of Susan M. Daum, MD and Ellen M. Poler, JD. On October 13, at age 90.
